footer_md: Trading on prediction markets carries a high degree of financial risk to your capital.  Please read our full [Risk Disclaimer](/assets/content/mainnet/RiskDisclaimerPolicy.html), [Privacy Policy](/assets/PrivacyPolicy.html) and [Terms of Service](/assets/content/mainnet/TermsOfService.html) before trading. – [Imprint](/assets/content/mainnet/Imprint.html)
footer_tournament_md: Olympia tournament is a testnet alpha for the sole purpose of collecting user experience feedback. Due to the stake of OLY as "play money" no one will face any financial risks. Please read our full [Privacy Policy](/assets/content/PrivacyPolicy.html), [Cookie Policy](/assets/content/olympia/CookiePolicy.html) and [Terms of Service](/assets/content/olympia/TermsOfService.html) before trading. – [Imprint](/assets/content/olympia/Imprint.html)

header.wrapped_ether_title: Your balance is calculated as the sum of your ETH and Wrapped-ETH balance.
header.cookie_disclaimer: We use cookies to give you the best experience and to help improve our website. Please read our <1>Cookie Policy</1> for more information. By clicking "Accept Cookies", you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation and analyze site usage.

dashboard.no_trades: You haven't made any trades recently.

market.not_found: This market could not be found.
market.creator: Creator
market.no_shares: You don't hold any shares for this market.
market.no_shares_hint: It may take some time for the blockchain to mine your share purchase.
market.no_trades: You haven't interacted with this market yet.
market.no_trades_hint: Every transaction that happens on this market will be shown here.
market.limit_margin_warning: The actual cost you will pay might be less by 5% depending on the market price at the time of trading
market.submit_error: Sorry - your investment couldn't be processed. Please ensure you have enough balance and filled all fields correctly

errors.negative_number: Number can't be negative or equal to zero
errors.not_enough_balance: You're trying to invest more than you have
errors.no_selection_made: Please fill in all mandatory fields
errors.loss_detected: This transaction is not permitted because it will result in a loss of an outcome token.

legal.heading: Terms of service and privacy policy
legal.to_use_app: For using {{appName}}, you have to agree with our

documents.address_public_description: I understand and agree that my wallet address will be publicly displayed on the scoreboard

reward_claim.info: In order to claim your <1>{{value}} {{symbol}} tokens, you first have to switch to the <2>{{targetNetwork} network in your current wallet. Also make sure you have enough ETH to submit the transaction with the claim request. More information in our <3>FAQ.

errors.wrong_network: Please connect to the mentioned network, before you can claim your reward.
errors.not_enough_balance: You do not have enough ETH for this transaction to cover the gas costs.
errors.failed_tx_ask_support: Unfortunately, the transaction failed. Please try again or contact our support for further assistance.

metamask.missing: Metamask is currently not installed or detected. <1>Please download and install Metamask</1> to start using {{name}}

register_wallet.heading: Register wallet address
register_wallet.instructions: Please register your wallet address, where we can send you {{symbol} tokens, and subsequently your {{rewardSymbol}} reward. Read our terms of service for more information
register_wallet.eth_required: You need Rinkeby ETH to register your wallet address.
register_wallet.not_enough_balance: Note: Not enough ETH balance in your MetaMask wallet to submit this transaction.

register_uport.heading: Setup claim Address
register_uport.disclaimer:
Please register your Metamask address, where we can send your winning GNO tokens in case you finished in the top 50.
Please note that you can register your address only once.
register_uport.failed_tx_ask_support: Sorry, the transaction failed. Please try again later or contact us!

switch_network.heading: Switch to the {{targetNetwork}} Network
switch_network.instructions: Your provider is not currently set to the {{targetNetwork}} network. Please switch to {{targetNetwork}} and make sure your wallet is unlocked to start using {{applicationName}}.

transaction_explanations.heading: We will ask you to approve the following transactions:

unlock.heading: Unlock your MetaMask wallet
unlock.instructions: Please unlock your MetaMask wallet to start using {applicationName}.

verification.sign_message: Please sign the Metamask message in order to continue the verification process.
verification.dont_close: If you close the Modal, you'll have to enter your data again. Are you sure?
verification.check_email: Please check your email to continue with the process.
verification.have_to_verify_identity: In order to interact with {{appName}} you have to verify your Identity with OnFido.

form.already_accepted_tos: You already accepted the terms of conditions. Please start the verification process by following the instructions.

errors.not_loaded: Our User Verification Integration could not be loaded.
errors.not_found: Sorry for the inconvience, please try again later!

reasons.application_denied: Unfortunately, you didn’t pass the verification process. Please get in contact with OnFido.com for further information.
reasons.signature_failed: Your Message Signature was rejected. Please try again, and make sure you're using the latest version of your wallet-provider.
reasons.previous_not_completed: It seems your previous verification did not complete. Please try again.
reasons.verification_pending: Please try again later. Check your E-Mails to continue with the verification process if you have not done so. Additionally, if you didn't receive an E-Mail, you can retry the verification below.

headings.waiting_for_approval: Your application is pending with our Verification Service
headings.denied_default: Sorry, you currently can't interact with {{applicationName}}

warning.price_changed:
The transaction could not be processed because the trading price changed.
Please check the new price and try again.

scoreboard.heading: Scoreboard
scoreboard.explanation_ranking: The total score is calculated based on the sum of predicted profits and {{tokenSymbol}} tokens each wallet holds. Scores are updated every hour.
